hero.header3:
Welcome!
Here is your new favorite place to eat
hero.subtext1: Flavorsome indicates good tasting, full of flavor, specifically pleasant flavor; implying delicious, tasty, appetizing, scrumptious, yummy, juicy, succulent, heavenly, inviting, luscious, mouthwatering, palatable, saporous, savory!
hero.subtext2: Tastes great! Eating something delicious right now!
hero.subtext3: Healthy foods are those that provide you with the nutrients you need to sustain your body's well-being and retain energy!

about.header: Enjoy quality time here at VecchiaRoma
about.description: Everything we do is about you. From chefs who create exciting new flavors, to crew members who know exactly how you want your drink â€“ we prioritize what you need to get you on your way. We strive to keep you at your best, and we remain loyal to you, your tastes and your time!
